content:
Hi there - is this public endpoint down? http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4
It worked last night but seems to be down this morning.

Apologies for this- It's back up.

Something weird is definitely going on with the bulk export module on that server, it seems to be exhausting all the RAM.
Np! FYI if you notice it's down please feel free to tag me here again. I'm gonna try to watch it closely but just in case I miss something.
